name: Barbarian Bounce
description:
Our entry in the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Barbarian Bounce is a three level long  platformer where the main character is out of your control. 

Move the platforms to race to the top before the Spider scares the Barbarian, but watch out for breaking platforms and grabby Ghosts!

INPUTS:

"A" or left arrow key = move platforms left

"D" or right arrow key = move platforms right

John -Michael Veach - concept, programming, sound

Dakota Cummins - concept, art, sound
